snippet: It is crucial for the United States and China to strengthen cooperation with each other in trade, investment, finance, infrastructure, technology and other fields.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Li Congjun, president of Xinhua News Agency, analyzes the roots of the global financial crisis; calls for the United States, China and the European Union to improve coordination on macroeconomic policies, and for China and the US to strengthen cooperation with each other in trade, investment, finance, infrastructure, technology and other fields.
lead_paragraph: It is crucial for the United States and China to strengthen cooperation with each other in trade, investment, finance, infrastructure, technology and other fields.
